data.title: Clonezilla Backup: Zeroing out unused space APFS SSD
data.meta_description:
Context: MacOS Big Sur APFS SSD.
Is there a command to zero out unused SSD space and verify that the unused space is zeroed?  I ask because many times files are not erased when they are deleted: th...
data.text:
In order for clonezilla to backup just the used space, it needs partclone to support the filesystem. That support has been added recently, but it is still considered experimental.

Download the testing version of clonezilla (right now at 3.0.2...) and you can test it out. Note however that the Clonezilla forum states:

Of course, since it's the initial [APFS] support, please backup important data before you use. Please give it a try and let us know the results if you can.
